30050000.English_Text: Come at me! I'll take on the world!
30050000.Chinese_Text: 全都放马过来吧！全世界的人们！

30050001.English_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Giant Night Gargoyle</>! You're Public Enemy Number One!

30050003.English_Text: I've brought a troubleshooter with me!

30050004.Original_Text: 신기하다. 신기해... 어떻게 그럴 수 있지?
30050004.English_Text: Amazing. It's amazing... How could this be?
30050004.Chinese_Text: 神奇，真是神奇...怎么会发生这种事情？

30050005.Original_Text: 아니, 내가 연구하는데 당신이 날 도와줘야지!
30050005.English_Text: You should help me out so I can do my research!
30050005.Chinese_Text: 不，你应该来帮我进行研究！

30050006.English_Text: My goodness. Nothing will get solved using these methods.
30050006.Chinese_Text: 哎哟，在这里请不要这样。

30050007.Original_Text: 더 많은 경험을 전해 주고 싶은데...
30050007.English_Text: I'd like to give you more experience...

30050008.Original_Text: 어디서든 배울 것이 있다. 열심히 하자!
30050008.English_Text: There's always something to learn, no matter where you go. Let's do our best!
30050008.Chinese_Text: 任何事物都有值得我们学习的地方。加油吧！

30050010.English_Text:
This isn't just because of my curiosity...
I really want to help everyone...
30050010.Chinese_Text:
这不是因为我自己好奇...
而是为了所有人...

30050011.English_Text: Oh, no! Mom! Teacher, please save me.
30050011.Chinese_Text: 哎哟！妈！师父。请饶我一命。

30050012.Original_Text: 내 이익이 결국 공공의 이익과 연결되지. \n난 좋은 사람이야.
30050012.English_Text:
My interest ultimately leads to the public's interest.
You know, I'm a good person at heart.
30050012.Chinese_Text:
我的利益最后会成为公共利益。
我真是一个好人。

30050013.English_Text: I knew it, Captain! You were always looking at the bigger picture!
30050013.Chinese_Text: 果然不愧是队长！真是远见卓识！

30050014.English_Text: I'm lucky to have such a good captain.

30050015.English_Text: The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Baron Pioneers</> are in shambles, meow...

30050016.English_Text:
Hmph! <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Leader</>, 
if you have any concerns, you can tell us, meow!
30050016.Chinese_Text:
哼！<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>聂喵</>
有什么烦恼说给我们听喵！

30050019.Original_Text: 좀 상태가 좋은 거로 손에 넣고 싶은데...
30050019.English_Text: I'd like to get something in better condition...

30050020.English_Text: No, that's not it, no matter how hard I think about it...
30050020.Chinese_Text: 这...不管怎么想也不对啊...

30050021.Original_Text: 또... 이분 또 이러시네... 독이 무슨...
30050021.English_Text: Not again... What kind of poison would...?
30050021.Chinese_Text: 又...这个人又来了...说什么毒...

30050022.Original_Text: 뭐라고? 목소리를 좀 크게 해봐. 안 들려.
30050022.English_Text: What? Speak up. I can't hear you.
30050022.Chinese_Text: 什么？你再大声一点，我听不到。

30050023.English_Text:
Ah... I can't leave <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol Quarters</>.
I'm so scared...
30050023.Chinese_Text:
唉...我都不敢走出<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>海越支部</>。
太可怕了...

30050024.English_Text:
Wait, what does maturity have to do with it?
What makes them strong is their<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>teeth</>... and <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>teeth</>!
30050024.Chinese_Text:
说什么成熟不成熟的...
最重要的是<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>牙齿啊</>...<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>牙齿</>

30050025.Original_Text: 머리가 있으면 생각을 할 수 있죠. \n장식이 아니라면요.
30050025.English_Text:
If you have a head, you can think.
That thing's not just for decoration, is it?
30050025.Chinese_Text:
有脑袋就应该懂得思考。
那可不是装饰品吧？

30050026.Original_Text: 여기까지 왔는데... 조금만 더 보고 싶은데...
30050026.English_Text: I came all the way here... I want to see more of it.
30050026.Chinese_Text: 都来到了这里...我想多看一点...

30050027.English_Text: That went well. This should be helpful.
30050027.Chinese_Text: 不错...这样就能用得上了。

30050028.Original_Text: 힘들 땐 결국 혼자야... 내가 해야 해.
30050028.English_Text: In the end, everyone is alone. I have to do this myself.
30050028.Chinese_Text: 遇到困难时只能靠自己...需要亲手解决。

30050029.Original_Text: 난 할 수 있다! 할 수 있어...
30050029.English_Text: I can do it! I can...

30050030.English_Text:
Oh, my stomach hurts...
Maybe it's because of that <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mushroom</>...
30050030.Chinese_Text:
唉...肚子好痛...
难道是刚才吃的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蘑菇</>...

30050031.English_Text:
Ah... what can I do...
They don't even sleep...

30050032.English_Text: I'm sure I'll be scolded if I go back like this...

30050033.English_Text: If the Red Don keep harassing passersby...

30050034.Original_Text: 인간과의 사이가 완전히 틀어져 버릴 텐데...
30050034.English_Text: Your relationship with humans would be completely broken...
30050034.Chinese_Text: 인간과의 사이가 완전히 틀어져 버릴 텐데...

30050037.English_Text: Human!!! Why do you keep coming back?!

30050038.English_Text: The manager also tried to talk to the Hongdon people...

30050039.Original_Text: 오호! 뚱뚱한 개미로군! \n내 감자를 뺏아먹는 녀석은 분명, 너다!
30050039.English_Text:
Oh! You're a fat ant! 
You're the one who steals my potatoes!
30050039.Chinese_Text:
오호! 뚱뚱한 개미로군! 
내 감자를 뺏아먹는 녀석은 분명, 너다!

30050041.Original_Text: 불쌍한 내 새끼... \n혼자 두고 출근할 수도 없고...
30050041.English_Text:
My poor bastard... 
I can't go to work alone...
30050041.Chinese_Text:
불쌍한 내 새끼... 
혼자 두고 출근할 수도 없고...

30050043.Original_Text: 뭐야! 이 나쁜 놈들, 왜 여기 있어!
30050043.English_Text: What! You bastards, why are you here!
30050043.Chinese_Text: 뭐야! 이 나쁜 놈들, 왜 여기 있어!

30050045.Original_Text: 내가 찾아낸 비밀 장소야! \n조수한테만 특별히 알려줄게!
30050045.English_Text:
It's a secret place I found! 
I'll tell only my assistant specially!
30050045.Chinese_Text:
내가 찾아낸 비밀 장소야! 
조수한테만 특별히 알려줄게!

30050046.English_Text: They drove out the wolves and even the Red Dons scolded!

30050047.English_Text: Our Doi, you must have had a good time.

30050049.English_Text: Let's stop and go back, okay?

30050051.Original_Text: 저 가야 해요, 정말. 갑니다. 네?
30050051.English_Text: I have to go, really. I go. Yes?
30050051.Chinese_Text: 저 가야 해요, 정말. 갑니다. 네?

30050053.English_Text: Boys of the Fighters!!! Up to here!!!

30050054.Original_Text: 이대로 돌아갈 순 없어! \n불쌍한 사슴들은 구해내야 해!
30050054.English_Text:
I can't go back like this!
The poor deer must be rescued!
30050054.Chinese_Text:
이대로 돌아갈 순 없어! 
불쌍한 사슴들은 구해내야 해!

30050056.English_Text: You should come to your senses...

30050057.Original_Text: 링링은 무섭지 않다냥! \n혼자 할 수 있다냥...!
30050057.English_Text:
Lingling isn't scary!
You can do it alone...!
30050057.Chinese_Text:
링링은 무섭지 않다냥! 
혼자 할 수 있다냥...!

30050058.English_Text: Wait, where are you, cool flowers~!

30050060.English_Text: Chilly palace~ Flower~ Where are you~~ Nyang~~!

30050061.English_Text:
It smells like warm salt~
The sunlight is refreshing too!
30050061.Chinese_Text:
따뜻한 소금 향기가 난다냥~
햇빛도 산뜻하다냥!

30050062.English_Text: It smells like something very close...

30050065.English_Text: What are you guys doing now?

30050067.English_Text:
Wait, treasure!
The Dongchung-sama is leaving!

30050069.English_Text:
No, you looked really strong! 
Let's trust and wait!
30050069.Chinese_Text:
아니야, 엄청 강해 보이셨어! 
믿고 기다리자!

30050070.Original_Text: 이 장엄한 폭포~ 푸른 바다~ \n너무 아름답다!
30050070.English_Text:
This majestic waterfall~ Blue sea~ 
It's so beautiful!
30050070.Chinese_Text:
이 장엄한 폭포~ 푸른 바다~ 
너무 아름답다!

30050072.Chinese_Text:
이 나쁜 놈들아! 
우리 그만 괴롭혀라!

30050073.Original_Text: 내 조수가 너네 다 혼내줄 거다!!
30050073.English_Text: My assistant will scold you all!!
30050073.Chinese_Text: 내 조수가 너네 다 혼내줄 거다!!

30050074.Original_Text: 겁먹어선 안돼. 잊지 마.\n내가 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>의 장로란 걸.
30050074.English_Text:
Don't be afraid. Don't forget.
I am the elder of Pungbaekmun.
30050074.Chinese_Text:
겁먹어선 안돼. 잊지 마.
내가 풍백문의 장로란 걸.

30050075.English_Text:
It was an accident. Accident. 
An accident that no one expected.
30050075.Chinese_Text:
사고였습니다. 사고. 
아무도 예상하지 못한 사고요.

30050077.English_Text:
I don't deserve a break... I don't deserve... 
...Stop it...
